}} The '1956â57 season' was Colchester United's seventh consecutive season in
the Football League Third Division South. They finished the season in 3rd
position, just one point shy of champions and rivals Ipswich Town who were
promoted to the Football League Second Division. Until 2006, the 1956â57 season
was the best in Colchester's history.
